channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Marriage: For Better...forever!
channel.desc: Marriage Counsler Greg Popcak Offers practical tips for nurturing the friendship in marriage. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Dr. Ray interviews two men who are leaders in faith, family and business. Joe Hamrock and Jeff Schiefelbein share insights into navigating today?s complex and challenging world. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Letter And Spirit
channel.desc: Dr. Scott Hahn and Mike Aquilina look at the life of Moses and the priestly people of the Book of Exodus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford explains we are no different than the Prodigal Son's older brother if we show indifference to others. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: Former NFL Wide-Receiver Danny Abramowicz and team talk about countering lust with fidelity in this hard-hitting look at Catholic spirituality for men. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Light That Never Fades
channel.desc: A documentary that explores the Byzantine rite and worship in Eastern Churches that are in communion with Rome. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Was There, The Holy Mass
channel.desc: A reverent animated account of a young man's realization of the meaning of the Mass for him. (30 minutes).
